name: Add two items to the shopping cart
scenarioId: store/makepurchase:Add two items to the shopping cart
methodName: Add two items to the shopping cart

testSteps.description: 1: Add two items to the shopping cart ({firstItem=Samsung galaxy s6, firstSection=Phones, secondItem=Sony vaio i5, secondSection=Laptops, name=Esteban, country=Colombia, city=Medellín, creditCard=1122334455667788, month=7, year=2026})

children.description: Given that Esteban wants to make a purchase on the demoblaze site
Esteban opens the Demoblaze home page
Esteban opens the Demoblaze home page
When he adds the Samsung galaxy s6 from the Phones section to the cart
Esteban add item
Esteban clicks on //a[@id="itemc"][contains(text(),'Phones')]
Esteban clicks on //div[@id="tbodyid"]//h4/a[contains(text(),'Samsung galaxy s6')]
Esteban clicks on Button to add the item to the shopping cart
Esteban clicks on Button to go to the home page
And he adds the Sony vaio i5 from the Laptops section to the cart
Esteban add item
Esteban clicks on //a[@id="itemc"][contains(text(),'Laptops')]
Esteban clicks on //div[@id="tbodyid"]//h4/a[contains(text(),'Sony vaio i5')]
Esteban clicks on Button to add the item to the shopping cart
Esteban clicks on Button to go to the home page

And he sees the products in the shopping cart
| firstItem | secondItem |
| Samsung galaxy s6 | Sony vaio i5 |
Then item
Esteban clicks on Button to go to the shopping cart
Then item
Esteban clicks on Button to go to the shopping cart
Esteban get

And he completes the purchase form
| name | country | city | creditCard | month | year |
| Esteban | Colombia | Medellín | 1122334455667788 | 7 | 2026 |
Esteban fill
Esteban clicks on Button to place the order
Esteban enters 'Esteban' into Input to enter the name
Esteban enters 'Colombia' into Input to enter the country
Esteban enters 'Medellín' into Input to enter the city
Esteban enters '1122334455667788' into Input to enter the card
Esteban enters '7' into Input to enter the month
Esteban enters '2026' into Input to enter the year
Esteban clicks on Button to purchase the items

Then he sees the confirmation message
| name | country | city | creditCard | month | year |
| Esteban | Colombia | Medellín | 1122334455667788 | 7 | 2026 |
Then purchase
